sentences.en: The police caught the man who tried to abduct the boy for ransom.
sentences.cn: 警察抓住了那个企图拐走这男孩以便勒索赎金的家伙。

sentences.en: He had attempted to abduct the three boys.
sentences.cn: 他曾企图诱拐那三个男孩。

sentences.en: The robber abduct the heiress and hold her to ransom.
sentences.cn: 强盗劫持了女继承人并向她索取赎金。
